ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I do.  And so do many of my friends and acquaintances.  Hehe obviously experience is needed to get from 46 to 50.  For many classes 49 is the great level
ygData.messageBody:
> Message: 12
> Date: Mon, 24 Jan 2000 15:51:42 -0500
> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> Subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
>
> I'm not forgetting about Kedge but the loot is horrible and people 46+ don't
> care about exp.

I do. And so do many of my friends and acquaintances. Hehe obviously experience is
needed to get from 46 to 50. For many classes 49 is the great level for spells.
For bards we have the 48 and 50 songs to get.

Plus some on this list argue that level is all in determining your effectiveness in
a raid.

In addition many agree that a full level buffer is a good idea before attempting the
planes. I would suggest that is even more the case after the recent patch.

> Same thing for paw and mm is usually bad loot to. 46+ don't
> care about exp it's just not needed.

Not needed??

> Cyclops are camped all the time on E'ci
> and allizweasuar is done when we need stuff. Again guards are just good for
> exp why do them when you don't need exp?

Again, ??

> Kedge Keep and paw are just two
> badly designed zones. As for guards they are boring and again we don't need
> exp.

And again...

> Besides the fact that they are camped 24/7 on e'ci hell I wasn't even
> on prime time on my de necro went into oggok and guards were camped inside
> and out same with grobb guards. Freeport guards are always camped to inside
> and out. The only places that aren't camped usually are mm, Paw, and Kedge.
> Although paw and kedge are bad zones and the loot isn't very good. Again why
> would a 50 want exp?

Because they truncated the 50 experience so every time you die in the planes or on
dragon runs etc. you lose experience. Unless and until you fall out of 50 into 49
this is likely not an issue. But with enough deaths the loss of level will
eventually happen. This means some loss in stats and of course for bards the loss
of use of Verses of Victory.


> MM is ok but the spawns are usually camped which makes
> it uselss. Hell I usually end up camping something in SOl A on my 50 necro
> so the overcrowding at high levles is definitly a issue.


Good sir, I agree completely with your core point. I found it to be unfortunately
obscured in this message.


//Maravana Vireo
//48 Bard of Jus Divinum
//Mithaniel Marr
